author: C. Hong
title: Watch: Gavy NJ Act Out a Mini Melodrama In "An Obvious Melo" MV | Soompi
text:
Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 
Pop ballad trio Gavy NJ is back with a new single! 
On February 23 KST, they dropped the mini-album and the title track of the same name, “An Obvious Melo.” 
The song and video tell the story of a young woman after a bad breakup who is remembering the happy moments of her romance and how it all slowly went wrong. 
The track combines the girls’ powerful voices with a catchy pop ballad melody that is part of the group’s signature sound. 
This is their first release after 2016’s “Shubirubirun” and the non-album single “Did You Feel Sorry For Me.” 
Watch the MV below!
